name: U.P.P.
overview: U.P.P. is a 2D Graphics puzzle game that features 2 different vs modes: against another human player and against the computer (that have 3 different game modes: tournament, single battle & team battle). There are 8 different character for the player to choose (4 males and 4 females) The game also features a complete manual that explain the game rules (in japanese but using the game graphics to explain the movements) and also features the character profiles. The gameplay is similar to Tetris. The player has to put three or more pieces of the same colour in horizontal or diagonal and you can also make chains if two or more are make with the same movement. There are a gauge with three cells you complete one when you feel the bar making combinations or chains if one is fileed you can make a weak attack, if you complete two you can make a normal attack and if you complete the three you can make the more powerful and special attack.
